ygData.subject: Re: Lupine Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Nope.  The armor is leather based with stat bonuses.  No effects. ... Lupine = Wolflike (from Lupus, meaning wolf).  Hence Spirit of the Wolf giving you a
ygData.messageBody:
>Does anyone have stats on the lupine armor? Sounds interesting....seeing as
>how the "surrounded by a lupine aura" message appears when you get SoW'd,
>does it have some type of SoW effect?

Nope. The armor is leather based with stat bonuses. No effects.

>Just curious. And...pardon my
>ignorance, but does anyone have a definition of lupine? Too lazy to open a
>dictionary I guess..:)

Lupine = Wolflike (from Lupus, meaning wolf). Hence Spirit of the Wolf
giving you a lupine aura. Lupine is to Wolf as Canine is to Dog.

Sandeep
